Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Heartbreaking \Heart"break`ing\, a. Causing overpowering sorrow. [1913 Webster]

heartbreaking adj : causing or marked by grief or anguish; "a grievous loss"; "a grievous cry"; "her sigh was heartbreaking"; "the heartrending words of Rabin's granddaughter" [syn: {grievous}, {heartrending}]
